Articles.Content:
Okay, I had some mod with this functionality before a reinstall, but I have no idea what it was, or even whether it was a standalone mod or part of a larger one.

Basically, it had an automatic info readout in the lower-left corner of the VAB screen (bottom of the screen, just right of parts), with a bunch of data about the current craft (mass, etc). Nothing flashy, no buttons, just a simple text overlay. I've reinstalled all the mods I thought I had before, but I'm not getting this functionality anymore. Would greatly appreciate someone pointing me in the right direction here if that sounds familiar.
That sounds like the overlay in the 1.0 version of Kerbal Engineer Redux.
Looks like I derped and installed KER v0.6 instead of 1.0+. Thanks.
